title: Translate Into System
text: Since the sum of the two number is fifteen we can write $$x+y=15$$. Additionally one number is three less than the other so we can write $$x=y-3$$.
speech: Since the sum of the two number is fifteen we can write  x plus y, is equal to, 15 . Additionally one number is three less than the other so we can write  x, is equal to y minus 3 .

title: Solve the System
text:
Using substitution we can substitute $$x=y-3$$ into $$x+y=15$$ to solve for $$y$$.
$$x+y=15$$
$$y-3+y=15$$
$$2y-3=15$$
$$2y=18$$

title: Solving for $$x$$
text: Given $$y=9$$, plug the known value into one of the equations to solve for $$x$$. What is $$x$$?
